author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this session recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm to learn more about what's shipping in Unreal Engine 5.7 and beyond. 

This know-before-you-go-hands-on presentation will help you understand the current state of major features, performance, quality of life improvements, and what lies ahead so that your own development plans can be even better informed.

Learn more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

#UnrealEngine, #UE5.7, #UnrealFestStockholm
title: Unreal Engine 5.7+ Roadmap and What's Next | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm, Epic Games joins M-XR to present an innovative workflow that combines RealityScan with M-XR’s Marso technology to create impressive and realistic physically based rendering (PBR) assets.

Learn more about RealityScan here: realityscan.com

#MXR, #Marso, #PBR, #PhysicallyBasedRendering, #RealityScan, #UnrealFestStockholm
title: PBR for Photogrammetry: Marso with RealityScan for Realistic Materials | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Stockholm, ArtStation presents a broad look at trends shaping the industry in its State of the Art report. 

The talk highlights key insights from platform-wide data, focusing on shifts in artist skills, software usage, hiring patterns, and emerging expectations from educators and recruiters alike.

Drawing on data from across the platform, as well as input from art schools and studio recruiters, this session explores how tools and skills are evolving, what studios are looking for, and how educators can better align with the industry's current trajectory.

Whether you're hiring, teaching, or building your career, you’ll gain a grounded understanding of where the art side of the games industry is heading.

Learn more about ArtStation here: artstation.com

#ArtStation, #StateOfTheArtReport, #UnrealFestStockholm
title: The State of the Art: What ArtStation Data Tells Us About the Industry | Unreal Fest Stockholm 2025
